snippet: “The President,” a reality show, allowed Palestinians to choose a leader, which they have not had the chance to do in more than a decade.
abstract: Reality television show The President allows Palestinians to enact semblance of running and voting for president, sending message to Palestinian Authority Pres Mahmoud Abbas, who is 11 years into term that was meant to last only five; show reflects both Palestinians' political views and desire for democracy.

byline.contributor: Majd Al Waheidi contributed reporting from Gaza City.

lead_paragraph: “The President,” a reality show, allowed Palestinians to choose a leader, which they have not had the chance to do in more than a decade.

headline.main: Palestinians Elect a New President (on a Reality TV Show)
headline.print_headline: Palestinians Cast Votes to Elect a New President (on a Reality TV Show)
